DOC.brief_summary: This study intend evaluate safe well tolerate LY2405319 compound give people 7 day ( Part 1 ) 28 day ( Part 2 ) . This study intend also determine positive effect lower level glucose people type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Effect LY2405319 After Multiple Injections Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects Part 1 randomize receive LY2405319 placebo 7 day one 4 dose level group , ascend order : 1 mg , 3 mg , 10 mg , 20 mg . Subjects Part 2 randomized receive LY2405319 placebo 28 day , receive dose level determine well tolerate Part 1 .
